name: California Grapefruit
description: California Grapefruit by DNA Genetics is an indica strain that draws from a palette of California-grown genetics: Northern Lights, Skunk #1, and Afghani. Loyal to her indica dominance, California Grapefruit promises a heavily relaxing effect that takes a few minutes to fully kick in, even when inhaled. The weight of this indica may just be enough to crush pain, insomnia, and muscle tension in most patients. Its earthy flavor is accented by a sweet, sour grapefruit aroma which lends this strain its name.
descriptionPlain: California Grapefruit by DNA Genetics is an indica strain that draws from a palette of California-grown genetics: Northern Lights, Skunk #1, and Afghani. Loyal to her indica dominance, California Grapefruit promises a heavily relaxing effect that takes a few minutes to fully kick in, even when inhaled. The weight of this indica may just be enough to crush pain, insomnia, and muscle tension in most patients. Its earthy flavor is accented by a sweet, sour grapefruit aroma which lends this strain its name.

highlightedReviews.text: I purchased a gram and smoked about half when I got home. It was the worst experience of my life. It felt as though I was 5 years old and couldn't do anything accompanied by horrible hallucinations. The people I talked to at the dispensary seemed unsure of the product and didn't talk much but they had a fair selection that was close by. I will NEVER buy from them again.
Very skunky earthy taste. THC wasn't very high and I will say it is fun to try all different kinds & strains, this one ranks  2/5 in my book

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Kill Bill, Viper, California Grapefruit, Tokyo OG, and White Haze
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It's Friday, which means it's time to kick off the weekend with some tempting new strains! This week, we've got some vicious new varieties like Kill Bill and Viper, as well as the flavorful California Grapefruit, the energizing White Haze, and the potent Tokyo OG. You suggested them, and now it's time to complete these strains with your review. Be sure to also check out which of these strains are available near you by navigating to their strain pages and clicking "Availability." You just might discover a new favorite!
   1. Kill Bill
Characteristics of Kill Bill:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Killer Queen and Willy's Wonder
Breeder: Reservoir Seeds
Skunky, pine aroma
Cerebral energy coupled with full-body relaxation
May help patients treating stress, pain, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   2. Viper
Characteristics of Viper:

95% sativa
Cross between Burmese and Mexican landrace strains
Breeder: Reeferman Seeds
Spicy, citrus aroma
Buzzing, active cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 10 weeks

   3. California Grapefruit
Characteristics of California Grapefruit:

Mostly indica
Cross between Northern Lights, Skunk #1, and Afghani
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Sweet, earthy, grapefruit aroma
Heavily relaxing with slow onset
May help patients treating pain, insomnia, and muscle tension
Indoor flowering time of 52 to 63 days

   4. Tokyo OG
Characteristics of Tokyo OG:

Hybrid strain
OG Kush phenotype
Lemon, pine, and diesel aroma
Relaxing indica effects
May help patients treating anxiety, stress, and pain

   5. White Haze
Characteristics of White Haze:

70/30 sativa-dominant strain
Haze hybrid
Breeder: Sensi Seeds
Spicy aroma
Lightweight, lofty buzz balanced by comfortable relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

growInfo.growNotes:
Optimal for sea of green (SOG)
	Yields typically fall between 18 and 50 grams per plant
